reviewText: This box set contains 3 previously released operas in their original DVD cases, housed in a thin cardboard box. All operas are available on Amazon individually. THE OPERAS ARE: AIDA (4.8 stars) 1985 Maria Chiara is Aida. Luciano Pavarotti is Radams. Ghena Dimitrova is Amneris. Loren Maazel conducts at La Scala. Singing is excellent. Acting is mostly excellent. The echo is a trifle annoying. A second disk contains a "making of" video. More information and Amazon customer reviews can be found here: Aida by Maria Chiara And here (without the "making of" video): Verdi - Aida / Maazel, Chiara, Pavarotti, La Scala And here (without the "making of" video): Verdi: Aida - Teatro alla Scala, Milan, 1985 by Lorin Maazel And here (without the "making of" video): Verdi:Aida [Maria Chiara; Luciano Pavarotti; Ghena Dimitrova; Juan Pons; Paata Burchuladze] [ARTHAUS: DVD] [2015] NABUCCO (3.7 stars) 2001 Leo Nucci is Nabucco. Maria Guleghina is Abigaille. Maria Domashenko is Fenena. Fabio Luisi conducts the Vienna State Opera. An excellent musical performance is betrayed by poor directing. There is virtually no scenery. The props are inappropriate. There is too much standing around while singing. More information and Amazon customer reviews can be found here: Verdi - Nabucco / Leo Nucci, Maria Guleghina, Giacomo Prestia, Miroslav Dvorsky, Marina Domashenko, Goran Simic, Fabio Luisi, Vienna Opera SIMON BOCCANEGRA (4.3 stars) 2010 Plcido Domingo is Simon Boccanegra. Ferruccio Furlanetto is Jacapo Fiesco. Fabio Sartori is Gabriele Adorno. Daniel Barenboim conducts at La Scala. Excellent singing. Some excellent acting but some standing around. Scenery is artistic, but sometimes abstract. More information and Amazon customer reviews can be found here: Simon Boccanegra BOX SET DUPLICATIONS: The box set "Magic Moments of Opera" contains the same production of "Aida" that this set does. It is here: Magic Moments of Opera by Placido Domingo The box set "Teatro Alla Scala The Opera Classics" contains the same production of "Simon Boccanegra" that this set does. It is here: Teatro alla Scala: Opera Classics
